plugins.name: scratch-operation
plugins.description: Automates Scratch editor operations via Playwright. Includes skills for VM injection (programmatic block creation), block dragging (visual UI interaction), sprite library (adding built-in sprites/backdrops), custom costume injection (adding SVG/PNG costumes programmatically), and project file management (downloading/uploading .sb3 files).

plugins.name: scratch-coding
plugins.description: Scratch programming patterns and techniques. Includes skills for coordinating multi-sprite pen drawing (synchronized pen clear) and storytelling with message chaining (sequential and parallel character dialog across scenes with backdrop switching).
